str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: From hupo and deo; to bind under one's feet, i.e. Put on shoes or sandals.
A sandal. Neuter of a derivative of sandalon; a slipper or sole-pad.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
A tunic, garment, undergarment. Of foreign origin; a tunic or shirt.
